translation.Message_0_Page_0: Hello! I'm <name_npc>. I had to leave my farm because it got overran by zombies...
translation.Message_0_Page_1: But hey it's a good life here at the HQ!
translation.Response_0: I'm sorry to hear about your farm.
translation.Response_1: I heard I could get farming supplies from you!?
translation.Response_2: I think I have to go and water my plant...
